"Auxiliary.R" is a set of simple functions, including a function used for generating eigenfunction; a function used for generating image data; a function used for generating multistate data; an estimation function; a function used for calculate score value;


“example_estimate.R” is an example of the proposed method for calculate the estimator of the coefficient of image.


“example_score.R” is an example of the proposed method for calculate the score value.
